words.source: Qal imperative feminine singular from אמר (amar); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Particle of entreaty; KJV 'I pray thee', NASB 'Please', ESV 'Say'
Feminine noun with first person singular possessive suffix; KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Second person feminine singular pronoun functioning as copula; KJV 'thou art', ESV 'you are'
Preposition + noun construct; ESV, NASB, NIV 'so that'

Preposition + first person singular pronoun; KJV, ESV, NASB 'for me'
Preposition + noun construct + second person feminine singular suffix; ESV, NASB, NIV 'because of you'
Conjunction + Qal imperfect third feminine singular from חיה (chayah); ESV 'my life will be spared', NASB 'I may live'

Preposition + noun construct + second person feminine singular suffix; ESV, NASB, NIV 'on account of you'
